Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts! So today I finally decided to join the KSP Community!

Well, I actually made my account a week or so back but only today did I remember to make this thread.

I was looking up about space things last year because a lesson in school got me interested, and I found the KSP site. At first I was a bit confused, but when I downloaded the demo and played it for the first time I found it to be pretty fun actually. About 2 weeks after that I brought KSP, and I have been hooked ever since, but only recently did I think about joining the community.

I would consider myself good at KSP, only last week did I get to the Mun on my second mission in my stock career save! (Not actually sure if that's good or not, but it works for me)

So I think that's all I'm going to say for now, don't really want to write paragraphs because I really am not in the mood right now. Also if there is anything else you guys want to know feel free to contact me.

Hello! Welcome aboard!

Congrats on getting to the Mun!
